item.description: Basic Python Workshop Series - for Beginners ğŸ“ Ole RÃ¶mers vÃ¤g 3, 223 63 Lund ğŸ“… February 15 & 22 & March 1 2023 17:30 ğŸ”— Facebook event Hub AI is hosting a beginners workshop to learn Python. The basics are introduced with exercises and projects and students have the chance to ask questions. This is presented by our Head of Education, Diego, and our Head of External Partnerships, Adrian.

Get active in the Hub! We offer free membership for all students at Lund University. Register here. You can also get active in the committee team, shape the future of Hub AI, expand your network, and develop professional and soft skills! Hub AI is growing and wants you on board for this exciting journey! We are looking for: a Head of Treasury, a Head of Events, and a 2nd Head of Marketing and Communication.
